original_text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus, and shall present us with you.
korean_text: 주 예수를 다시 살리신 이가 예수와 함께 우리도 다시 살리사 너희와 함께 그 앞에 서게 하실 줄을 아노라

sentences.original_text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus
shall raise up us also by Jesus
and shall present us with you
